Conflux historic price sentiment Conflux price history | Coinmarketcap Conflux launched at approximately $0.08 in late 2020 and reached an all-time high of $1.70 on March 27, 2021, during a crypto bull run. It dropped below $1.00 in May and ended the year at $0.1994. Conflux experienced significant losses, falling below $0.10 by mid-May 2022 and closing the year at $0.02198 after a nearly 90% annual decline. Starting the year 2023 at an all-time low of $0.02191, CFX rose above $0.30 in February following a partnership with China Telecom and peaked above $0.40 several times in March and April. It declined to $0.278 by June due to SEC lawsuits, dropped to $0.125 in August, and closed the year at $0.185. By January 2024, CFX increased to $0.2323 and surged above $0.51 in March before falling toward $0.2. It consolidated around $0.22 in April and May, dropped to $0.13 in June, and oscillated between $0.11 and $0.25 from July to October, ending November near $0.2. In December, the price of CFX dropped toward the low of $0.15. Conflux began trading at $0.1561 in January 2025 and currently trades between $0.144 and $0.15.

title: XRP At Critical Juncture As Price Restests 21 EMA ‚Äì Details
body: The XRP market experienced a downbeat end to January translating into a 7.05% loss over the past seven days. In regards to future price movements, popular analyst Egrag Crypto states the altcoin is currently at a key crossroads with an equal chance to move in either a positive or negative direction. Related Reading: Dogecoin Whales Go Ham As They Buy 560 Million DOGE In One Week XRP Set For Price Breakout, But How High Can It Go? In an X post on February 1, Egrag Crypto explains that XRP‚Äôs recent slump has resulted in the asset retesting two crucial levels namely the 21 EMA and and the lowest boundary of a symmetric triangle. The exponential moving average (EMA) is a technical indicator that smoothens out price data over a period of days (i.e. 21 in this case) while giving more weight to recent prices. It is commonly used in trend confirmation with a price dip below the EMA line indicating a bearish trend and vice versa for a bullish trend. On the other hand, a symmetric triangle formed by price movement signals a period of consolidation before a decisive price breakout. With the price of XRP simultaneously hovering near the 21 EMA line and the lower boundary of the symmetric triangle around $2.93, the altcoin presents a rather delicate situation to traders and investors alike. According to Egrag Crypto, further declines for XRP are possible. However, prices are unlikely to fall below $2.83 ( the ascending purple line) which has served as a strong support zone based on historical data. However, based on the sole analysis of the symmetrical triangle, a break below the lower boundary could force XRP to trade as low as $2.40. Alternatively, should XRP break above the upper boundary of the triangle, it could immediately rally to $4. Egrag Crypto¬†warns that both breakout possibilities are equally weighted. Therefore, the XRP market is subject to high levels of volatility over the coming days. Related Reading: Avalanche Forms A Falling Wedge On The Daily Chart ‚Äì Breakout Target Set At $56 Whales Offload 70 Million XRP In 4 Days In other news, crypto expert Ali Martinez reports that XRP whales are currently on a selling spree having offloaded 70 million XRP, valued at $204.4 million, over the past day. High selling activity especially from whales is a bearish signal that signals uncertainty about the future profitability of an asset. Alternatively, certain long-term holders may be looking to take profit. However, XRP retail investors may expect more price drops in the short term, barring the introduction of significant buying pressure. At press time, XRP trades at $2.93 reflecting a 3.10% decline in the past day. Meanwhile, the asset trading volume is down by 12.60% and valued at $4.06 billion. Featured image from iStock, chart from Tradingview

title: Crypto Markets Shed $150B as Trump‚Äôs Trade War Hits China, Canada, Mexico (Weekend Watch)
body: Bitcoin and most altcoins have turned red in the past 12 hours or so, with BTC dumping below the coveted $100,000 line and many alts posting substantial losses. This came after US President Trump signed orders to impose harsh tariffs on imports from China, Mexico, and Canada. BTC Below $100K Bitcoin‚Äôs business week started with a nosedive that pushed it from $105,000 to under $98,000 in hours, but the asset bounced off and erased all losses in the next few days. The weekly peak came on Thursday, after the US Fed left the interest rates unchanged, as bitcoin jumped to over $106,500. However, it failed to maintain its run and was rejected on Friday, which resulted in a price dip to $101,500. The landscape worsened in the past 12 hours or so as the bears propelled another leg down that drove the cryptocurrency to well below $100,000. In fact, its intraday low came at $99,000 (on Bitstamp), which is being retested now as well. This somewhat unexpected price decline over the weekend could be attributed to the political scene that Trump shook last night. He signed an order to impose a 10% tax on all imports from China as well as 25% on imports from Mexico and Canada. Only energy coming from Canada will be taxed at 10%. Mexico and Canada retaliated by imposing taxes on US imports as well, while China said it would file a case against the States at the World Trade Organization. With this decline, BTC‚Äôs market cap has slumped to $1.970 trillion on CG, while its dominance over the alts has climbed to over 56%. BTCUSD. Source: TradingView Alts Bleed As it typically happens in such situations, the altcoins were hit the hardest. Ethereum is down to $3,100 after a 4.5% daily decline. XRP is below $2.9, while SOL, DOGE, LINK, AVAX, TON, and XLM have plunged by up to 9%. Even more painful declines come from VIRTUAL, HYPE, JASMY, RAY, TAO, LDO, THETA, FET, and GALA, as all of them are down by double digits. The cumulative market cap of all crypto assets has shed roughly $150 billion in a day and is down to $3.5 trillion on CG. Cryptocurrency Market Overview. Source: QuantifyCrypto The post Crypto Markets Shed $150B as Trump‚Äôs Trade War Hits China, Canada, Mexico (Weekend Watch) appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: ECB president reignites Bitcoin ‚Äì XRP debate in resurfaced 2019 video
body: The European Central Bank (ECB) president generated buzz in the crypto community and the wider financial market when she weighed in on the debates about the need to set up a strategic crypto reserve. The United States and other interested countries are looking at Bitcoin as the perfect asset for their reserves, and there have been talks about other digital assets making the list. However, recent comments by ECB President Christine Lagarde are making waves. In her statement, Lagarde rejected the idea of incorporating Bitcoin into the European reserves, listing factors like volatility and its association with money laundering. The comments came after the Czech National Bank Governor Ales Michl announced that the bank is considering adding Bitcoin to represent 5% of its reserves. While Lagarde has been vehemently against Bitcoin, an old video shared by crypto influencer Amelia surfaced, where the ECB president hailed distributed ledger technology (DLT), while drumming its implications for the financial markets. ECB president reveals stance on DLT In the video posted by user Amelie on X, Lagarde talked about the technologies utilizing the DLT, noting that they are ‚Äúclearly shaking the system.‚Äù The video contrasts with her current stance concerning Bitcoin and her belief that it will not be incorporated into the EU reserves. In the video that was recorded in 2019, Christine Lagarde discussed extensively the financial disruptors that are using DLT. üö® ECB‚ÄòS CHRISTINE LAGARDE ALREADY TOLD YOU IN 2019: ‚ÄûANYTHING THAT IS USING DISTRIBUTED LEDGER TECHNOLOGY, WETHER YOU CALL IT CRYPTO ASSETS, CURRENCIES OR WHATEVER ‚Äì AND IT‚ÄòS FAR FROM BITCOIN ‚Äì THAT IS CLEARLY SHAKING THE SYSTEM!‚Äú TODAY SHE IS SAYING THAT SHE IS ‚ÄûCONFIDENT‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/APtAHtuKIz ‚Äî ùìêùì∂ùìÆùìµùì≤ùìÆ (@_Crypto_Barbie) February 1, 2025 Lagarde mentioned at the time that there were two key players in the space, listing incumbent banks and disruptors. She added that the disruptors are actively shaping the traditional banking landscape. ‚ÄúWe just heard a very large systemic bank here saying that they‚Äôre launching the digital coin, currently piloted in a way within the institutional clients, but to be scaled beyond that,‚Äù Lagarde said. She also referenced the TARGET Instant Payment Settlement (TIPS) launched by the bank in 2018 to facilitate low-cost, instant transactions between European banks. However, she added that DLT is clearly shaking the system. ‚ÄúAnything that is using distributed ledger technology, whether you call it crypto assets, currencies, or whatever, and it‚Äôs far from the Bitcoins that we used to talk about a year ago, that is clearly shaking the system,‚Äù she added. Lagarde‚Äôs view on Bitcoin and implications for XRP With Lagarde‚Äôs current stance on Bitcoin and the potential exclusion of the asset from the EU reserves, it is clear that the ECB president believes that the real disruptive technology was not Bitcoin. This means that she views other assets built on the distributed ledger technology as better. Meanwhile, XRP supporters and the wider crypto community are interpreting the DLT comments to mean that she is backing XRP as the future of finance. According to a user on X, the ECB president‚Äôs statement was very clear, and it means that XRP is the future. ‚ÄúExactly! Christine Lagarde‚Äôs 2019 statement made it clear: the real disruption isn‚Äôt Bitcoin‚Äîit‚Äôs the power of distributed ledger technology, and #XRP is at the forefront of that revolution. The future is clear, and it‚Äôs #XRP, not BTC!,‚Äù the user said. With the 2019 video and Lagarde‚Äôs current stance making the rounds, there has been a debate about which digital assets are better equipped for the financial systems of the future. While the ECB is yet to pick out digital assets in its crypto reserve, its president‚Äôs comments might push towards a DLT-based token, with XRP currently in the lead in that aspect. The token is good for financial institutional use due to its low-cost, cross-border abilities. While Bitcoin has been chalked off the list, DLT-based solutions are about to become the next big thing. title: Best Crypto To Buy Now In 2025? A Deep Dive Review of The Rise of Memes ($RISE)
body: The crypto market in 2025 is expected to shine bright with the bull run in full swing and crypto-friendly advancements from the Trump administration taking place. Investors are looking for cryptos that could explode to add to their portfolios to take full advantage of the anticipated crypto take off. Amongst numerous launches on a daily basis, one project in the crypto space is rapidly gaining attention from retail investors and influencers ‚Äì The Rise of Memes. This article will take a deep dive into The Rise of Memes and try to understand if this could be one of the best crypto to buy this year. A New GameFi Crypto Presale Takes The Market By Storm The blockchain gaming industry is evolving rapidly, and The Rise of Memes ($RISE) is making waves as one of the most promising crypto projects in the space. It aims to combine GameFi mechanics with the power of meme culture to capture the attention of both gamers and crypto investors, banking on the viral nature of meme coins and those looking to earn rewards for playing. $RISE presale has just recently kicked-off and is performing great, with the numbers close to $400,000 raised so far, signalling high interest. With a unique approach to play-to-earn gaming, The Rise of Memes promises an engaging experience beyond traditional meme coins. But what makes it stand out? Let‚Äôs dive into the details. What is The Rise of Memes? At its core, The Rise of Memes is a real-time strategy mobile game where players battle for dominance, forming alliances with each other and conquering the fictional game world ‚Äì Meme Kingdoms. Unlike ordinary meme coins that rely on social media trends, this project integrates real gaming utility and rewards in form of $RISE tokens. The game revolves around: Factions and Heroes : Inspired by popular memes like Doge, Pepe, Cat coins and many others, the game introduces its own versions of these characters such as General Doge, Storm Pepe, Meowshe, etc., that can be unlocked in the game, each with distinct strengths and strategies. Each hero leads a faction with unique units, tactics, strengths and weaknesses. Alliances : Players can form alliances, with a ranking system of officers, leaders of alliance and new recruits. Alliances conquer territory and place outposts to claim lands. Other alliances can attack these lands resulting in wars between alliances. The strongest alliances with its leader can rule the Meme Kingdoms with a King at the helm. PVP & PVE Battles : Players can engage in battles with each other on the open map or raid mobs for rare loot ‚Äì weapons, armor, gems, resources and much more. Battles happen in real-time and players will need to navigate their troops strategically to flank or to take a fight head-on. Players can also besiege each other‚Äôs cities to take resources and weaken oponents to gain honor if the players are from rivaling alliances. Token Economy : $RISE tokens can be earned for major achievements in the game and spent in the game store for upgrades, traded amongst each other or sold on exchanges for real-world value. With an emphasis on strategic gameplay, socialization and financial incentives, The Rise of Memes aims to offer long-term value way beyond just speculation. Meme Coins Meet Utility Meme coins have often been dismissed as hype-driven assets with little intrinsic value. This makes meme coins unsustainable in the long-term and after massive pumps, the price often slides down to new lows. The Rise of Memes challenges that notion by merging meme culture with meaningful blockchain functionality and real-world value that could provide the project with consistent growth by attracting new players into the tokens economy. Here‚Äôs what sets it apart: Engaging Gameplay : Unlike most meme coins, which are purely speculative, this project has an actual fun game behind it, designed to build a community around it. Token Economy : $RISE tokens can be used both in-game and in the real world. Sustainable Economy : A structured tokenomics model, with frequent buybacks and most of the tokens dedicated for regards(40%), ensures long-term usability and rewards for players. By offering both entertainment and economic incentives, The Rise of Memes aims to position itself as a major player in the GameFi sector. The Rise of Memes Gameplay Factions Players can choose from five distinct factions at the start of the game, each with unique playstyles and advantages: Stonepaws ‚Äì A faction embodying brute strength and destruction. Ironhorns ‚Äì Bullish warriors that charge forward with resilience. Leapblades ‚Äì Agile fighters known for their unpredictable tactics. Shadowclaws ‚Äì Stealth-based warriors specializing in covert operations. Valorhounds ‚Äì Noble defenders with strategic precision. The project promises to add more factions in time and token holders will be able to vote on the new factions that will be introduced to the game. Heroes Each faction comes with specialized heroes. These heroes have unique abilities that can influence battles and shape the game‚Äôs strategic depth. For example: Valorhounds are lead by the notorious General Doge , a noble warrior with a greatsword who was the original ruler of the Meme Kingdoms. Now his rule is questioned by other factions such as Leapblades. Meowshe , a stealthy archer-cat, leads the Shadowclaws into battle in the cover of the night, which makes them fierce warriors when the lights are off. Storm Pepe , Generals Doge‚Äôs direct rival and the leader of the Leadblades faction strikes with precision with his dual swords and aims to conquer the Meme Kingdoms for himself. Bullguard , a legendary warrior and a beacon of hope for many, the leader of the Ironhorns faction who aims to conquer the Meme Kingdoms and establish years of prosperity and riches. Bearclaw , leader of Stonepaws and a rival to Bullguard and a totem of destruction, who wants to flood the Meme Kingdoms with tears and blood and establish his own reign, where hope doesn‚Äôt exist. Just like with factions, new heroes will be introduced to the game, each driving inspiration from other notable meme characters from the crypto space and token holders will have an opportunity to participate in deciding which heroes will be added to the game. Battles Player vs Player & Player vs Environment (PVP & PVE) Battles in The Rise of Memes are divided into two types ‚Äì PVP and PVE. PVE battles will allow players to fight mobs and launch raids on the map in collaboration with other players. Mobs will drop valuable loot for players that can be used in crafting or upgrades. The higher the difficulty of the mob ‚Äì the better the loot. Most powerful mobs may drop $RISE tokens. PVP is where it gets interesting. According to the game‚Äôs whitepaper , the game world will be open with players being able to roam around freely, battling others for dominance. This is where alliances come in. In order to conquer their home kingdom, players will need to come together, form alliances and take over land in the Meme Kingdoms. At later stages of the game, the most powerful alliances will be able to test their resilience against other kingdoms, where other players and alliances reign. This creates a competitive narrative for the game that allows each player to display his valor and strength. Alliances and Socialization The social aspect of The Rise of Memes plays a crucial role in its gameplay. Players can form alliances, which function as decentralized guilds. The game will also include a kingdom and alliances chats, where players can communicate with each other and discuss recent victories and developments. Benefits of Alliances Coordinated Battles : Team up for large-scale wars and strategic victories. Resource Sharing : Pool resources with allies for mutual benefits. Territory Control : Compete for land and in-game dominance. Additionally, the Meme Kingdoms News keeps players updated on major events, faction conflicts, and leaderboard rankings, creating a lively community-driven environment. $RISE Token Utility The $RISE token serves as the foundation of The Rise of Memes ecosystem. It has multiple uses, ensuring its long-term relevance. Key Functions In-Game Purchases : Buy heroes, skins, resources, and in-game assets. Staking & Rewards : Earn passive rewards by staking tokens. Governance : Participate in community decisions and vote on updates. Play-to-Earn Rewards : Gain tokens by completing quests and winning battles. The tokenomics structure is designed to create sustainable growth and long-term value for holders and players alike. Presale Overview The presale phase of The Rise of Memes has already gained substantial traction, despite its very recent launch. The project started at an entry price of $0.0002 per token , but demand has pushed it up to $0.000428 . The presale is set for multiple stages with price increasing at every consecutive stage and after every 5 days. The launch price is expected to be set significantly higher than its final presale stage, which could benefit early participants. Key Presale Highlights Total Tokens Sold : 650 million $RISE tokens. Funds Raised : Over $400,000 so far. Presale Allocation : 20% of the total 100 billion token supply. The presale is still in its early stages as the project gains traction and attracts investors. This may be a good opportunity for those looking to capitalize on $RISE tokens launch by getting in early. Security and Transparency With scams and rug pulls being a major concern in the crypto space, The Rise of Memes takes safety precautions seriously by auditing their smart contract and passing KYC verification with an established firm in the crypto space SolidProof, achieving a Trustnet score of 91.5 , one of the highest achieved. We have finished the KYC process for @riseofmemesgame Well deserved KYC Gold Tier! Check the security score here: https://t.co/izQG80jDBx Need a Smart contract audit, KYC or development support? Send us a message, our sales team will gladly make a customized offer for you!‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/25oHrl97Sh ‚Äî SolidProof.io Daily (@solidproof_news) January 5, 2025 SolidProof is a German-based audit company that audits smart contracts for newly developed projects with a history of bringing transparency to DeFi space. It is worth to mention that The Rise of Memes was awarded a gold-tier badge for their KYC and Audit submissions, which is a notable achievement as this award is considered extremely rare. Influencer Attention The project has attracted significant attention from major crypto influencers and GameFi content creators. Their support has played a crucial role in spreading awareness and fueling presale success. One of the most recent posts on Youtube about The Rise of Memes was made by Jake Bury, a prominent figure in the crypto space with a total following count of over 100,000 across platforms. Jake addressed the project‚Äôs unique approach to integrating meme coins and utility and that it has the potential to perform in a market where meme coins are the center of attention. Key Reasons for Influencer Interest Strong Meme Appeal : The branding resonates with crypto communities. Engaging Gameplay : It‚Äôs not just another meme coin‚Äîit has real utility. Transparent Development : Regular updates and team communication foster trust. As influencer endorsements continue, The Rise of Memes is expected to see even greater exposure leading up to its official launch. Conclusion The Rise of Memes is a very ambitious project with a groundbreaking fusion of meme culture and GameFi, offering a refreshing take on play-to-earn gaming. With a well-structured economy, deep gameplay mechanics, and a strong presale performance, the project stands out in the crypto gaming landscape and has all the chances to be one the best crypto to buy now. Why This Can Go Big Unique Gameplay in GameFi : Nothing of this magnitude has been attempted in GameFi space as of yet, making The Rise of Memes standout amongst all other P2E and meme coin tokens. Community-Driven Growth : Strong emphasis on alliances and social elements that could establish a large community for many years to come. Sustainable Tokenomics : The game aims to set a solid foundation for long-term growth and replayability, which will keep audiences engaged, boosting $RISE token value post launch. If its execution matches its ambitious vision, The Rise of Memes could be one of the most exciting GameFi projects of the year. Whether you‚Äôre an investor, gamer, or meme enthusiast, this is a project worth keeping an eye on. Visit The Rise of Memes Official Website to take a closer look at the project. Stay updated on $RISE developments by following their Telegram and X Channels .

title: Coinbase Acquires Spindl to Boost Onchain Advertising for Base Network
body: Coinbase, a leading cryptocurrency exchange, has acquired Spindl, an onchain advertising and attribution platform. This is a strategic move to enhance project visibility on its Ethereum layer-2 network, Base. Announced on January 31, the acquisition aims to address the discovery challenges faced by onchain builders. Revolutionizing Onchain Ads The acquisition of Spindl brings with it the expertise of its founder, Antonio Garc√≠a Mart√≠nez. He was instrumental in building Facebook‚Äôs original ads platform. This advertising framework played a key role in scaling the platform and empowering small businesses to gain viral traction. Base creator Jesse Pollak highlighted Spindl‚Äôs capabilities in a January 31 X video, stating that the platform was designed entirely through smart contracts onchain. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre coming to do it again onchain,‚Äù Pollak said. He also emphasized Spindl‚Äôs mission to help builders go viral and reach wider audiences. Pollak noted that the acquisition would provide essential resources for developers on Base, enabling them to attract power users. Echoing this sentiment, Coinbase‚Äôs head of business development, Shan Aggarwal, also described the move as a ‚Äúwin-win‚Äù for both builders and users. He praised Spindl for creating the first comprehensive onchain advertising protocol that aligns audiences with engaging onchain projects. Paving the Way for Onchain Advertising Innovation Eric Seufert, an early investor in Spindl and an investor at Heracles Capital, revealed that his decision to back the company came after Garc√≠a Mart√≠nez shared his vision for onchain attribution and measurement during a meeting in Austin. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm excited to see how the Spindl team moves advertising forward in partnership with Coinbase,‚Äù Seufert said in a January 31 post. The acquisition signals Coinbase‚Äôs broader ambition to advance decentralized finance and innovation on its Base network. Pollak has also hinted at the potential availability of tokenized shares of Coinbase stock (COIN) for U.S. users, a move that could further integrate real-world assets onchain. Tokenized COIN shares are already accessible to non-U.S. users via protocols like Backed. However, Pollak confirmed that expanding this offering to Base‚Äôs domestic users is being actively explored. The post Coinbase Acquires Spindl to Boost Onchain Advertising for Base Network appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Bitcoin Price Drops Below $100,000 ‚Äì What Caused the Sudden Decline?
body: Bitcoin fell sharply over the weekend as financial markets reacted to President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs on major trading partners. The cryptocurrency fell sharply below $100,000 after reaching a high of $106,000 in the past 24 hours. The decline comes as traditional markets remain closed and crypto assets bear the brunt of investor uncertainty. Chart with 1-hour candles showing the decline in BTC price. Making good on long-standing trade threats, Trump has imposed 25% tariffs on nearly all imports from Mexico and Canada, and 10% on imports from China. The tariffs will go into effect this Tuesday and will be applied without exemptions, a senior White House official told the Wall Street Journal. Related News: Will the US Create a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve? Here's the Latest According to Trader Forecasts ‚ÄúThe continued flow of illicit opioids and other drugs has profound consequences on our Nation, endangering lives and placing serious strain on our healthcare system, public services and communities,‚Äù Trump said in an Executive Order justifying the duties. The administration has linked the duties to efforts to curb the smuggling of fentanyl into the United States, placing the burden on affected countries to take corrective action before the duties are reconsidered. Ethereum (ETH) is down around 4%, XRP is down 3%, and Solana (SOL) is down around 6%, contributing to a broader sell-off in the digital asset space. Canadian officials have signaled their displeasure with the tariffs, with outgoing Prime Minister Justin Trudeau warning of countermeasures. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Bitcoin Price Drops Below $100,000 ‚Äì What Caused the Sudden Decline?

title: Solana selloff: SOL price goes red as $1 trillion milestone nears
body: Solana price retreated sharply during the weekend even as the network capped a record $258 billion milestone in January. Solana ( SOL ) dropped to $210 on Sunday, down by almost 30% from its highest level this year, bringing its market cap to $103 billion. At last check, SOL hovered at around $212. See the chart below. Source: CoinGecko It‚Äôs not just Solana ‚Ä¶ The ongoing sell-off in the crypto industry sent most coins into the red. Bitcoin ( BTC ) moved briefly below $100,000, while the total market cap of all cryptocurrencies crashed by almost 4% to $3.4 trillion. Solana‚Äôs coin dropped even after the network capped its most successful month on record. According to DeFi Llama , protocols in the Solana ecosystem handled over $258 billion in volume in January. That‚Äôs a record high. The increase brought the total volume handled in the network to over $969 billion. If the trend continues, expect Solana to cross the $1 trillion milestone in February. After all, it is handling over $40 billion a week. The biggest players in the Solana DEX ecosystem were Orca, Meteora, and Lifinity and Raydium ( RAY ), which had a 30-day volume of over $120 billion during the month. You might also like: Bitcoin will eventually be zero, economist predicts: Here‚Äôs when Meme coin launches Various meme coin launches drove growth across the network. President Donald Trump launched Official Trump ( TRUMP ), which became one of the biggest meme coin launches on record as its market cap surged to over $15 billion. It‚Äôs currently down 70% from its peak. The other top meme coin launches in January were Melania and Vine. As shown below, over 78,000 new Solana tokens are created daily. Solana tokens created in January | Source: SolScan Solana loses momentum The number of active Solana wallets dropped to 3.6 million. That‚Äôs down from 6.5 million on Jan. 19. Also, the market cap of all Solana meme coins has slipped to $14 billion from last month‚Äôs high of $25 billion. Solana price chart | Source: crypto.news The daily chart shows that the SOL price has crashed in the past few days. It has retreated from the year-to-date high of $295.4 on Jan. 19 to the current $213, its lowest swing since Jan. 17. The coin, created by former Qualcomm engineer Anatoly Yakovenko in 2017, has moved below the 50-day moving average and the key support at $223, its highest swing on Jan. 6. It has moved below the 50-day moving average and is nearing the key support at $210, its highest level on March 18 last year. The next price point to watch is $170 ‚Äî the neckline of the double-top pattern. Hope for a Solana ETF Recently, Cboe BZX refiled applications for multiple asset managers, including Bitwise, VanEck, 21Shares, and Canary Capital. This marks Cboe‚Äôs second attempt after a previous rejection, with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission now reviewing the filings under what‚Äôs considered to be a more crypto-friendly White House. The new SEC acting chair, Mark Uyeda, is seen as more supportive of crypto, raising expectations for approval. Polymarket bettors put Solana ETF approval odds at 57% by July 31, though Bloomberg analysts suggest Litecoin could be next in line. Meanwhile, Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs have already drawn billions, signaling strong demand for crypto investment products. The key question remains: Will regulators embrace more crypto ETFs, or keep altcoins waiting? At least one expert believes in Solana: analyst Knox Ridley of I/O Fund . Solana‚Äôs unique ‚Äúproof of history‚Äù protocol will make it a market leader, Ridley says . The blockchain‚Äôs PoH enables a high throughput of 65,000 transactions per second without second layers, making it faster and more efficient than Ethereum ‚Äòs protocol, proof of stake, which clocks in at a maximum recorded TPS of 62.34, as per Chainspect . Read more: Trump hypes crashing meme coin, hedge funders cry ‚Äòhavoc‚Äô

title: Are Trump tariffs crashing crypto? Virtuals Protocol, Bittensor, Neo, Jasmycoin among top laggards
body: Cryptocurrency prices are crashing, with the total market capitalization of all coins falling by nearly 4% to under $3.6 trillion. Bitcoin ( BTC ) and most altcoins were in the red, with tokens like Virtuals Protocol, Bittensor, Neo, and Jasmycoin being the top laggards. All these tokens crashed by over 15% on Sunday. The main reason why Bitcoin and other altcoins are crashing is the ongoing risk-off sentiment in the financial market amid the tariff risks. President Donald Trump will implement a 10% tariff on Chinese imports and a 25% levy on Mexican and Canadian goods. The three countries have pledged to retaliate on these tariffs, risking a substantial economic crisis. The new trade war has led to a big market volatility increase. U.S. benchmark equity indices ended lower Friday as markets analyzed the latest reading of the Federal Reserve‚Äôs preferred inflation metric as well as the looming tariff threat. The Dow Jones, S&P 500, and Nasdaq 100 indices all dropped by almost 1%. And U.S. inflation increased by the most in eight months, suggesting the Federal Reserve would probably not cut interest rates any time soon. You might also like: Bitcoin will eventually be zero, economist predicts: Here‚Äôs when In addition to the market volatility, these tariffs will impact inflation and the Federal Reserve. Economists anticipate that companies will increase prices to deal with the change in price. As such, General Motors and Ford vehicles brought from Mexico will see a 25% increase. The same is true with other items like televisions and smartphones. pic.twitter.com/SWZtSm6NMX ‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 1, 2025 Cryptocurrency prices drop when there is substantial volatility and economic risks in the United States. They also fall when the Fed is highly hawkish. Bitcoin price double-top pattern formation Bitcoin chart by crypto.news Further, Bitcoin and other altcoins are in the red after the former formed a high-risk chart pattern, pointing to further downside. It has formed a double-top pattern at $108,445, and its neckline is at $88,940. A double-top is one of the most popular bearish patterns in the market. Bitcoin has also formed a bearish divergence chart pattern as the Percentage Price Oscillator and the Relative Strength Index have continued falling. The PPO indicator is derived from the MACD, one of the most popular divergence patterns in the market. Therefore, there is a risk that Bitcoin will drop to $88,940, especially if it loses the 50-day moving average support. As such, altcoins are falling as Bitcoin crash risks rise. Read more: Bitcoin crash may be ‚Äògood,‚Äô Rich Dad Poor Dad author Kiyosaki says: Trump tariffs put pressure on crypto

title: How This Ethereum Whale Made $16.8M Profit Shorting ETH
body: An Ethereum whale managed to mint a staggering $16.8 million by going short on ETH price ahead of today‚Äôs 5% correction. Amid today‚Äôs broader market sell-off, ETH tanked to $3,050 once again, triggering over $81 million in long liquidations. As the Trump tariff kicks in on Feb 1, the crypto market is facing strong volatility as analysts expect strong turbulence on Wall Street next week. Ethereum Whale Makes Massive Money By Going Short An Ethereum whale has made significant gains by shorting ETH with 50x leverage as the altcoin price took a downturn, amid broader crypto market correction . Currently, the trader is sitting on an unrealized profit exceeding $16.8 million, as per Hypurr Scan data . Source: Hypurrscan The high-leverage move by Ethereum whale has attracted attention within the crypto community, highlighting the volatility and profit potential in the market during periods of ETH decline. title: Dogecoin set for ‚Äòsteep price correction ahead,‚Äô warns expert
body: Dogecoin ( DOGE ) is facing another round of bearish pressure, aligning with the general cryptocurrency market narrative, with a trading expert warning of more losses for the top meme coin. The potential drop stems from a technical formation where DOGE is experiencing a bearish crossover between the Market Value to Realized Value (MVRV) Ratio and its 30-day Simple Moving Average ( SMA ). Historically, this has signaled downward pressure, according to prominent trading expert Ali Martinez in an X post on February 2. DOGE price analysis chart. Source: Ali_charts The MVRV Ratio is a key metric to assess whether an asset is overvalued or undervalued relative to its realized price. When the ratio crosses below its 30-day SMA, it often suggests that holders are entering a period of profit-taking, leading to increased selling pressure. ‚ÄúDOGE just experienced a bearish crossover between the MVRV Ratio and its 30-day SMA, signaling a steep price correction ahead,‚Äù Martinez stated. Initially, in another X post on February 1, Martinez suggested that Dogecoin would likely drop to $0.20, observing that it followed a similar pattern to Pepe (PEPE). Based on the four-hour chart, Dogecoin appeared to mirror PEPE‚Äôs recent price drop. DOGE and PEPE price analysis chart. Source: Ali_charts At the time, Martinez emphasized that the $0.31 support level was crucial to avoid further declines. If this support fails, historical price action indicates that DOGE could see a deeper correction toward $0.20, aligning with PEPE‚Äôs recent trajectory. Dogecoin‚Äôs potential recovery path Meanwhile, pseudonymous trading analyst Trader Tardigrade suggested that Dogecoin‚Äôs downturn might not last long. According to the expert, DOGE might be gearing up for a bullish turnaround, as the meme cryptocurrency shows a bullish divergence on its daily Relative Strength Index ( RSI ). Despite DOGE forming a new lower low in price action, the RSI indicator is printing a higher low, signaling that downside momentum is weakening and a potential trend reversal could be on the horizon. DOGE price analysis chart. Source: TradingView Historically, such divergences often precede an upward move as selling pressure subsides and buyers step in. As reported by Finbold, Trader Tardigrade initially stated that DOGE has the potential to spike by about 3,000%, given historical setups. In general, Dogecoin is experiencing notable capital outflows as cryptocurrency markets continue to be impacted by uncertainties stemming from the DeepSeek sell-off . Additionally, there is uncertainty in the market following President Donald Trump‚Äôs announcement of a 25% tariff imposition on goods from Canada and Mexico. The drop in DOGE has largely been led by Bitcoin, which lost its $100,000 support level. Indeed, Dogecoin has also failed to react to bullish news surrounding the token. Specifically, there was anticipation of a DOGE rally following Grayscale‚Äôs launch of a Dogecoin Trust, which has increased institutional interest in the coin. The potential influx of institutional capital from such an investment product is vital in helping the meme coin move toward the $1 mark. DOGE price analysis As of press time, DOGE was trading at $0.30, having plunged by over 8% in the last 24 hours, while on the weekly chart, the token is down 10%. DOGE seven-day price chart. Source: Finbold As things stand, Dogecoin investors should anticipate further downward momentum, considering the asset‚Äôs technical setup for the short term remains bearish. For instance, the price is below the 50-day SMA ($0.3513) but remains above the 200-day SMA ($0.2247), indicating long-term support. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Dogecoin set for ‚Äòsteep price correction ahead,‚Äô warns expert appeared first on Finbold .

title: CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju Says Bitcoin Bull Market Isn‚Äôt Over, Reveals Five-Year Forecast for Altcoins
body: The chief executive of a prominent crypto analytics firm believes that the Bitcoin ( BTC ) bull market has enough fuel to witness more rallies. CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju tells his 401,300 followers on the social media platform X that demand for Bitcoin spot market exchange-traded funds (ETFs) is still going strong, indicating that deep-pocketed investors are positioning for more BTC rallies. Ki notes that he thinks BTC will print a market cycle top once demand for Bitcoin ETFs tapers off. ‚ÄúThe Bitcoin bull cycle isn‚Äôt over. The buying engine for paper Bitcoins is still running. In 2021, the downturn came two months after GBTC (Grayscale Bitcoin Trust) inflows dried up. No need to rush calling the cyclical top until ETFs, MSTR (MicroStrategy), and institutional buying slow down.‚Äù Source: Ki Young Ju/X At time of writing, Bitcoin is trading for $99,669. Turning to altcoins, Ki believes that investors will see alts in a different light in five years. According to the analyst, most altcoins will stop serving as speculative assets as he believes investors will value them based on their earnings ‚Äì much like how they value stocks. ‚ÄúThe era of altcoins existing solely as a measure of internet attention span will be over within five years. Meme coins will persist as gambling products‚Ä¶ Beyond those, altcoins that are actually building will evolve into employment contracts for internet knowledge workers. It is undeniable future that these altcoins will evolve into an internet economic framework that enables compensation for the value generated in the processes of information creation, distribution, and acquisition.‚Äù Don't Miss a Beat ‚Äì Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. title: Terra Luna Classic Burn Hits 400 Billion As Binance Burns Over 700 Million LUNC
body: The world‚Äôs largest crypto exchange Binance burns more than 700 million Terra Luna Classic tokens in the 30th batch of its LUNC Burn Mechanism. With this, the total LUNC tokens burned by the community has reached over 400 billion milestone. Also, the circulating supply has dropped to 5.5 trillion LUNC. Meanwhile, LUNC price has dropped 6% amid the broader crypto market selloff due to a trade war triggered by US President Donald Trump. Binance Burns 736 Million Terra Luna Classic LUNC Tokens Crypto exchange Binance sent more than 736 million LUNC tokens to the burn address, as per the burn transaction on February 1. This was one of the lowest burn by the exchange since it started LUNC burn mechanism to support the Terra Luna Classic community. In the 30th batch of the LUNC burn mechanism, the crypto exchange burned $87,923 in trading fees for the period between December 31 to January 30. This brings the total LUNC burned by the exchange to 70.85 billion LUNC tokens, as per the burn tracker. Notably, Binance burned 1.7 billion LUNC tokens in the previous month after a massive trading volume in response to bankruptcy and token burns by Terraform Labs. Terra Luna Classic Burn Landmark by the Community The chain is managed by the Terra Luna Classic community with help from validators and developers via governance voting. The burn campaign has hit another landmark as the total LUNC burned by the community has surpassed 400 billion. The community members are upbeat on the Terra Classic revival narrative. Multiple projects and Cosmos developers have come in support and performed tasks, with Binance founder Changpeng ‚ÄúCZ‚Äù Zhao promising the community to support in LUNC burn campaign. LUNC and USTC Price Performance LUNC price tumbled 6% in the last 24 hours, with the price currently trading at $0.00007068. The 24-hour low and high are $0.00007017 and $0.00007641, respectively. However, the Terra Luna Classic trading volume has increased by 25% in the past 24 hours, indicating a rise in interest among traders. Analysts are still confident about a rally to $0.0005. Meanwhile, USTC price also fell 8% to $0.013 in the last 24 hours. The trading volume has increased by 33% in the last 24 hours. The post Terra Luna Classic Burn Hits 400 Billion As Binance Burns Over 700 Million LUNC appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Gold Hit ATH, Bitcoin Plunges‚ÄîWhat‚Äôs Driving the Divergence?
body: It has been less than two weeks since Donald J. Trump stepped back into the White House, and he has already rattled the cages with numerous controversial decisions. The latest came on Saturday evening as he levied hefty taxes on China but also its two neighbors ‚Äì Canada and Mexico. Given the fact that his actions came during the weekend when only one financial market was open for trading, it was expected that this particular market would face the music. Bitcoin Slumps During the Weekend Trump‚Äôs 25% tariffs on Canada didn‚Äôt go unnoticed, and the latter‚Äôs Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, responded kindly by imposing the same tax on American goods. Following Trump‚Äôs justification , claiming that these taxes aim to protect American citizens, as well as reducing the flow of drugs and undocumented immigrants into the US, Trudeau had this to say: ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt want to be here; we didn‚Äôt ask for this.‚Äù However, he added that his country would ‚Äúnot back down‚Äù and that their retaliation was a sign that they would be ‚Äústanding up for Canadians.‚Äù With Mexico preparing its response and China said to challenge Trump‚Äôs tariffs at the World Trade Organization, the situation seems far from reaching a peak, and there‚Äôs no de-escalation in sight.¬†Moreover, the US president has a clause in the order he signed that allows him to impose even bigger taxes should the aforementioned nations retaliate, as they seem to be doing. The political landscape worsened during the weekend as Trump‚Äôs orders were signed on Saturday, and the only opened financial market received the biggest blow. Being a 24/7 tradable asset, BTC‚Äôs price slumped from over $106,000 on Friday to under $98,500 earlier today. BTCUSD. Source: TradingView Gold Hits ATH On the surface, gold‚Äôs price actions in the past several days seem to contrast with those of BTC. After all, the precious metal shot up to a fresh all-time high of almost $2,820/oz on Friday. However, the bullion also retraced after its new peak and closed Friday (and January) at just under $2,800. XAUUSD. Source: TradingView Moreover, gold, just like stocks and all other non-crypto financial markets, is closed for trading during the weekend, so the impact on it is yet to be seen. The futures markets offer little insight as of press time, so when the Asian trading session opens on Monday morning, it will reveal the true picture behind Trump‚Äôs actions. At the same time, the impact on crypto and BTC could also worsen if a bigger sell-off transpires in the next few days. The post Gold Hit ATH, Bitcoin Plunges‚ÄîWhat‚Äôs Driving the Divergence? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Three Altcoins Priced Under $0.50 That Might Surpass Bitcoin by 2025
body: Bitcoin's market dominance is still strong, yet altcoins priced below $0.50 might achieve greater percentage increases. Historically, low-cost altcoins have outpaced BTC due to their higher volatility and rapid adoption. Tron (TRX), Dogecoin (DOGE), and DTX Exchange (DTX) are three promising assets poised for substantial growth. TRX is broadening its influence in the DeFi and stablecoin sectors, DOGE has seen a resurgence in bullish activity thanks to whale purchases and institutional interest, while DTX is revolutionizing the exchange market with its VulcanX blockchain capable of 200,000 transactions per second. Experts suggest that these affordable altcoins possess the fundamentals, adoption rates, and catalysts to outshine Bitcoin's performance in 2025. Tron (TRX): DeFi Growth and USDT Usage Boost Its Appeal Tron (TRX) has shown consistent bullish trends, driven by its role as a leading blockchain for stablecoins and decentralized finance (DeFi). USDT transactions on the Tron network have exceeded those on Ethereum, cementing its status as a preferred network for fast and economical transactions. Source: Tradingview A major factor in TRX's upward trajectory is the expansion of its DeFi ecosystem. With a Total Value Locked (TVL) of approximately $7.68 billion, Tron ranks among the largest DeFi ecosystems. As stablecoin usage continues its ascent, and Tron manages a significant share of USDT's total volume, the demand for TRX is on the rise. Currently priced at $0.254, TRX could potentially climb to $0.40-$0.50 by 2025 if DeFi and stablecoin adoption trends persist. Technical analysis indicates TRX is holding above its 200-day moving average, suggesting ongoing bullish momentum as it targets higher price levels. Dogecoin (DOGE): Whale Involvement & Institutional Backing Bolster Optimism Dogecoin (DOGE) has regained attention with increased whale accumulation and growing institutional investment. On-chain metrics show that significant investors acquired close to 600 million DOGE in just a week, indicating strong faith in the future performance of this meme-inspired currency. Source: Tradingview Crypto analyst Ali Martinez highlighted that Dogecoin whales made a substantial purchase of 560 million DOGE, marking a significant accumulation phase. This buying trend, coupled with increasing demand and market optimism, points to DOGE being poised for a breakout. Another factor driving DOGE's price is the introduction of Grayscale's Dogecoin Trust, offering institutional investors a regulated avenue to invest. Furthermore, Bitwise's application for a DOGE ETF adds to the speculation of broader mainstream acceptance. Trading at $0.32, analysts foresee DOGE breaking through the $0.35 barrier, potentially rallying towards the $1 mark. The intraday trading volume has jumped 36%, reaching $1.57 billion, reflecting heightened investor interest and increased buying pressure. With whale backing, rising institutional interest, and an upward trend, Dogecoin remains a top contender among altcoins priced under $0.50 to watch in 2025. DTX Exchange: A Promising Low-Cap Asset Set for a 10x Increase While TRX and DOGE boast established ecosystems, DTX Exchange is an emerging force gaining momentum. Unlike meme coins, DTX is underpinned by solid fundamentals, aiming to connect traditional finance and DeFi through its rapid trading platform. DTX has recently reached over 500,000 holders and secured over $13 million in its final presale phase. With VulcanX blockchain's capability of 200,000 TPS, DTX stands as one of the quickest and most scalable trading platforms in the cryptocurrency arena. Priced at $0.16 per token, analysts predict DTX could soar 5x-10x after listing, especially as it secures both CEX and DEX listings. Its distinctive value proposition distinguishes it from typical exchange tokens like BNB and FTT. With a growing user base and institutional interest, DTX's potential upside could surpass TRX and DOGE by 2025, marking it as one of the most promising sub-$0.50 altcoins. Future Prospects: Which Altcoin Will Outshine Bitcoin? As Bitcoin is expected to reach new peaks in 2025, altcoins with robust adoption and growth potential might achieve even greater percentage increases. Tron (TRX) is leading in DeFi adoption and stablecoin dominance, and if this trend holds, it could reach $0.40-$0.50. title: Machines vs. markets: The AI takeover of finance | Opinion
body: Disclosure: The views and opinions expressed here belong solely to the author and do not represent the views and opinions of crypto.news‚Äô editorial. Autonomous agents, powered by artificial intelligence and run on decentralized networks, will upend the financial market‚Äîleveling the playing field, bringing in more market transparency, and growing crypto‚Äôs utility. You might also like: Agents present a Netscape moment for AI and crypto | Opinion Upwards of 75% of all trades in traditional markets are made by algorithms, with quantitative trading firms cashing in for their ability to bring in returns above market averages. However, these insights (and subsequent gains) are still locked away and not evenly distributed to all investors. Autonomous agents build on this technology and democratize it through the blockchain. Right now, these self-executing programs can already interact with blockchains, execute trades, manage portfolios, and participate in decentralized finance protocols. Autonomous agents explained There is a lot of talk about agents in the market right now, but not everything called an autonomous agent truly is one. A real autonomous agent can work independently using AI without human help. For example, it‚Äôs not very autonomous if an agent relies on a public API that could be shut down or a credit card denied for payments. Companies like Microsoft already use real (non-autonomous) agents to improve their processes in areas like sales, finance, and operations. These agents take over repetitive tasks, which saves businesses time and money. Across blockchain, autonomous agents can democratize access to financial tools and opportunities, making the ecosystem more inclusive. With their ability to process vast amounts of data and act intelligently, these agents can drive innovation, improve capital efficiency, and unlock new ways for participants to engage in markets. It‚Äôs like giving blockchain a brain‚Äîturning it from a rigid system into something that can learn, adjust, and make intelligent choices in real-time. Taking on finance In traditional finance, data streams are siloed and controlled by major players. Accessing this data requires money, and gaining faster access demands even more money. Even then, investors cannot be 100% sure that others don‚Äôt have preferential access. In crypto, data is more meritocratically accessible to everyone. People have the same tools to extract data from a blockchain as major players like BlackRock or Citadel. And through autonomous agents, retail investors can intelligently and continuously manage tasks like market monitoring, asset allocation, and risk mitigation. At decentralized exchanges like Botega, investors have access to a system where autonomous agents can subscribe to liquidity pools and price sources. These subscriptions essentially notify agents quickly of any changes in volatility. Right now, agents on decentralized exchanges are already making over 70% of all transactions. More access and quicker insight mean bigger gains. This will have a massive impact on retail investors, on-chain data providers, and the utility of crypto. Outside of consumers, who will have access to previously out-of-reach market strategies, on-chain data providers who can deliver data in a trusted and fair way will become essential. This creates an opportunity for businesses that build robust infrastructure to support the growing ecosystem of autonomous agents. The availability of autonomous agents will also grow crypto‚Äôs general user base. By eliminating the need for technical expertise or constant oversight, agents will give everyday users the confidence to engage with DeFi, driving broader crypto adoption and inclusivity. Potential risks There are risks we need to look out for as well‚Äîthe most notable being their reliance on centralized infrastructure. Many autonomous agents run on centralized servers, use enterprise APIs to access AI models, operate on traditional financial rails, and source data from paid providers. Each of these is a potential single point of failure. An agent could lose its capabilities due to debanking, censorship, or infrastructure shutdowns. Another major risk is the lack of transparency around whether these agents are truly AI. It‚Äôs often hard to tell if a decision, post, or statement comes from a genuine AI or a human masquerading as one to manipulate narratives. Ironically, while CAPTCHAs have long evolved to distinguish humans from machines, the challenge now is verifying whether a machine is actually behind a decision. Decentralized infrastructure offers a solution to these risks by enabling cryptographic verification of AI actions on-chain, ensuring transparency, and reducing reliance on centralized systems. Looking into 2025 By the end of 2025, agent interactions will likely surpass human interactions in the blockchain‚Äôs financial sector, particularly in DeFi. This shift will be driven by autonomous agents‚Äô efficiency, speed, and scalability, making them the preferred choice for executing trades, managing portfolios, and automating complex strategies. Autonomous agents represent the next logical step in autonomy, fundamentally changing how we live, work, and operate businesses. They offer a chance to participate in the productivity and innovation boom they enable. Missing out on this shift would be shortsighted, as the growth potential for those who back the right solutions is enormous. However, we need to balance excitement with caution. Like the dot-com era, not all autonomous agents will succeed, but those that deliver real value hold immense potential. Read more: For AI that serves people, data curation DePINs hold the key | Opinion Author: Ivan Morozov Ivan Morozov , founder of Autonomous Finance and co-author of the AO protocol, is a technologist specializing in financial infrastructure and agent-based financial systems.

title: Indian crypto holders face 70% tax penalty on undisclosed gains
body: India will impose tax penalties of up to 70% on undisclosed crypto gains as part of new regulations under Section 158B of the Income Tax Act.

This is the period you manage your risk, by the way, as it is on resistance.‚Äù Source: Mikybull Crypto Will Ripple‚Äôs XRP Continue Seeing Light at the End of the Tunnel? Having stagnated at the seventh position for the better part of three years, XRP has found its footing, thanks to the pro-crypto policies expected to be rolled out in Donald Trump‚Äôs administration. As a result, discussions about XRP being included in the US Strategic Reserve are in high gear, thanks to the executive order recently made by President Trump. title: Bitcoin Indicator Shows Market Far From Overheating ‚Äì Details
body: Crypto analyst Axel Adler Jr. has provided some insights on the current status of the Bitcoin (BTC) market based on the adjusted Net Unrealized Profit/Loss (aNUPL) indicator. Despite recent consolidation, Adler states the BTC market remains bullish with a trend reversal far from happening. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price In Trouble? Bearish Divergence That Led To Market Crash Last Cycle Returns Bitcoin Has More Room For Growth, No Euphoria Yet ‚Äì Analyst The aNUPL indicator is a crypto trading metric used to assess the market sentiment and potential price movements. As the name implies, it modifies the traditional Net Unrealized Profit/Loss by considering market behavior over time, thereby determining if investors‚Äô unrealized profits or losses are sustainable or merely speculative. According to Adler Jr., Bitcoin‚Äôs aNUPL currently stands at 0.4, indicating that investors are holding a significant amount of accumulated profit, which represents a healthy but controlled level of market optimism. Furthermore, this aNUPL shows that Bitcoin is maintaining its bullish momentum. Notably, the crypto asset has been in an uptrend since September 2024, translating into a robust bullish structure. However, in both cases, an aNUPL of 0.4 remains far from the peak levels of 0.7-0.8 recorded in the previous bull cycles in 2017 and 2021. These critical high levels represent the presence of investor euphoria/greed as evidenced by an overleveraged market. By interpretation, Adler‚Äôs market insights currently suggest that the Bitcoin market is not overheated and may likely experience further growth barring any unexpected macroeconomic development. Related Reading: Bitcoin Trades At Discount For The Past Month Signaling Selling Pressure ‚Äì What This Means What Next For BTC? According to its daily trading chart, Bitcoin is currently valued at $100,824 following a 1.72% decline in the past day. The asset‚Äôs Relative Strength Index currently stands at 50.43 which shows room for higher price levels before entering the overbought zone, thus aligning with Axel Adler‚Äôs postulation. This positive projection is further supported by the 100-day simple moving average which remains well below Bitcoin‚Äôs price in a classic bullish signal. Regarding price barriers, Bitcoin faces psychological resistance at the $106,000 price region breaking past which could spur a return to its current all-time high at $109,114. However, another rejection at $106,000 would force the premier cryptocurrency to remain in a consolidation phase that has lasted over the past two weeks. In the long-term, investors retain bullish sentiments on Bitcoin driven by historical data and the crypto-friendly approach of the Donald Trump administration. Before the bull run concludes, the premier cryptocurrency is expected to trade between $150,000 ‚Äì $350,000. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from Tradingview
tags: Bitcoin|Axel Adler Jr|bitcoin|Bitcoin aNUPL|Bitcoin market overheating|btcusd|BTCUSDT

Despite its leadership in decentralized applications and smart contracts, Ethereum's market share has dipped to a multi-year low of 13.1%. This decline is largely due to the emergence of faster and more cost-effective alternatives like Solana, Cardano, and Binance Smart Chain. The development of Layer-2 solutions has alleviated some of Ethereum's congestion issues; however, concerns about its long-term efficiency and cost remain. Ethereum's transition to a proof-of-stake model marks a major milestone, yet supporters are closely monitoring other protocols that offer similar benefits without scalability challenges. Ethereum's future leadership will depend on its ability to evolve alongside the dynamic blockchain landscape. Stellar (XLM) Strengthens Its Position as a Payment Leader Stellar (XLM) is solidifying its role in the payment industry, with a focus on enabling seamless cross-border transactions. The network‚Äôs open-source, decentralized framework supports quick and affordable transfers between digital and fiat currencies, making it a favored choice for international remittances. A notable development for Stellar has been its collaboration with MoneyGram, which facilitates the conversion of cash to USD Coin (USDC) via the Stellar network. This advancement enhances financial accessibility and inclusion, bolstering Stellar‚Äôs standing in the payment ecosystem. Boasting an average transaction fee of merely 0.00001 XLM and processing times of less than five seconds, Stellar offers significant advantages for micropayments and cross-border transfers. The anticipated introduction of smart contract capabilities through Protocol 20 is expected to further increase its adoption and applicability. Lightchain AI: A Promising Investment on the Rise Lightchain AI is rapidly emerging as a pivotal player in the blockchain sphere, melding artificial intelligence with decentralized tech. Unlike conventional networks, Lightchain AI is designed for optimal efficiency, scalability, and real-world application. The project emphasizes blockchain enhancement and AI-driven smart contracts, making it accessible to both developers and businesses. These attributes simplify processes, enhance efficiency, and promote wider adoption, distinguishing Lightchain AI from its competitors. With its impressive presale performance and upcoming expansion plans, Lightchain AI is attracting investors seeking the next significant blockchain innovation. Analysts anticipate notable growth post-launch, positioning it as a leading altcoin for 2025. As Ethereum faces growing competition, initiatives like Lightchain AI and Stellar are proving that innovation and scalability are vital for the next phase of blockchain advancement. title: ‚ÄúHigh Chance XRP Will Flip Ethereum Soon,‚Äù Asserts Ex-Goldman Sachs Analyst
body: Dom Kwok, a former Goldman Sachs analyst and co-founder of Easy, has shared an optimistic outlook, noting there is a ‚Äúhigh chance‚Äù that XRP could soon surpass Ethereum to become the second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap. This prediction comes on the heels of XRP‚Äôs impressive performance since November 2024, when the broader crypto market rallied following the U.S. presidential election. Last week, the crypto asset surged to $3.39, marking its highest price since 2018. Despite subsequent consolidation, XRP has maintained strong momentum, outperforming much of the market. Last weekend, XRP surged over 10%, leaving most top 10 cryptocurrencies behind. Notably, this surge propelled the XRP/ETH pair, a metric tracking XRP‚Äôs performance relative to Ethereum, to a 50-month high of 0.0007883. By early this week, the pair climbed even further, reaching 0.0008820, igniting renewed discussions about XRP‚Äôs potential to outpace Ethereum. Meanwhile, in a tweet on Wednesday, Kwok expressed the possibility of a significant shift in the crypto rankings, stating , ‚ÄúHigh chance that XRP flips ETH very soon. Are you ready for a new world order?‚Äù His confidence stems from the rapid expansion of the XRP Ledger (XRPL) ecosystem, fueled by the anticipated surge of capital through tokenized real-world assets (RWAs). XRP boasts a market cap of $161.2 billion, a $7.4 billion increase following its recent rally. The asset trades at $3.01, reflecting an impressive 53% gain since the beginning of 2025. In contrast, Ethereum‚Äôs market cap stands at $370 billion, with the cryptocurrency posting a modest 7.8% drop since the year began. That said, for XRP to surpass Ethereum, it would need to reach a price of $6.83, assuming Ethereum‚Äôs market cap remains static. This translates to a required price increase of 115.5%. Although such a leap may appear ambitious, market analysts, including EGRAG Crypto, have suggested it is within reach. Recently, the pundit predicted that XRP could surge to $7.5 once it breaks through key resistance levels, calling this price point the ‚ÄúGenuine Wake-Up Line.‚Äù Earlier last month, analysts from Sistine Research weighed in on XRP‚Äôs potential, noting that such a move is ‚Äúmuch closer than you think.‚Äù According to the analysts, with the asset currently trading around $2.45 on January 4, it could surpass Ethereum at approximately $4.36 and Bitcoin near $21, based on their analysis of current prices. Elsewhere, Antony Welfare, CEO of digital asset solutions firm EnterpriseGoCapital, acknowledged that while some predict XRP could surpass Ethereum‚Äôs market cap, it would require a 250% increase to surpass Ethereum, assuming ETH stays stagnant. ‚ÄúIs $XRP going to blow minds? Many are speculating that XRP could surpass Ethereum‚Äôs market cap‚Ä¶ but is it realistic?‚Äù he asked . ‚Äú We‚Äôve seen this scenario before. For example, on September 21, 2018, XRP was ranked Number 2 behind Bitcoin, following a 62% 24-hour surge. Fast forward to today, and for XRP to top Ethereum, it would need a 250% pump‚Äîassuming Ethereum doesn‚Äôt move.‚Äù That said, the bullish sentiment surrounding XRP reflects growing confidence in its ecosystem and potential utility in transforming global finance. However, skeptics argue that Ethereum‚Äôs dominance in smart contracts and decentralized applications will be hard to overcome.

title: Former XRP Hater Says XRP Pump to $10 Will Melt Faces.
body: Popular crypto influencer Crypto Beast (@cryptobeastreal) recently made a bold statement about XRP‚Äôs next mega rally. His post on X, accompanied by a chart showing XRP‚Äôs rapid rise, highlights a significant shift in sentiment. According to the tweet, he used to be an XRP hater. He wrote, ‚ÄúThe XRP pump to $10 will melt faces. I used to be a XRP hater, now I love it.‚Äù His post suggests that he has fully embraced XRP‚Äôs potential and believes in its continued growth. He also advised his followers to stay updated for potential sell signals, implying he would provide guidance on when to exit the market. The $XRP pump to $10 will melt faces. I used to be a XRP hater, now i love it. I‚Äôll tell you when to sell so make sure you‚Äôre following. pic.twitter.com/tPxN7xtN5P ‚Äî Crypto Beast (@cryptobeastreal) February 1, 2025 Examining the Chart and Market Trends The attached chart illustrates a sharp upward movement in XRP‚Äôs price over the past few months. This surge began in November 2024 after Donald Trump‚Äôs presidential election victory and continued into January 2025 when the asset hit a multi-year high of $3.39. Crypto Beast expects this surge to continue and culminate at the $10 level, a target other analysts have recently predicted for XRP in 2025. XRP‚Äôs Potential to Convince Haters Over the past few months, XRP has converted many haters through its resilience and price performance. While Crypto Beast is a notable XRP convert, the top member of this group is Peter Brandt, a veteran trader and well-respected financial expert. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Brandt previously predicted that XRP would go to $0, but the asset‚Äôs remarkable performance has changed his mind. Brandt, just like Crypto Beast, is now a strong supporter of XRP and has provided notable bullish predictions for the digital asset, showing its potential to dominate the market. The $10 Target In 2025 While Crypto Beast did outline a precise path for XRP to hit this target, factors such as increased investor confidence, increased institutional interest, and a broader market rally could push XRP toward it. However, one of the most influential factors is the outcome of Ripple‚Äôs legal battle with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). This lawsuit held XRP‚Äôs price down since 2020 when it was filed, and the end of the lawsuit could be a major turning point. Donald Trump has outwardly expressed his love for the crypto market and has nominated Paul Atkins, a pro-crypto SEC Chair. While his nomination has not been confirmed, many including legal experts like Jeremy Hogan believe the SEC will dismiss the Ripple lawsuit under Atkins. The end of the lawsuit would give XRP a historic push, potentially reaching and even surpassing the $10 target. title: Crypto robbers face 76 years in prison for kidnapping and assault
body: A group of crypto robbers have been arrested and sentenced to jail for kidnap and assault. The kidnappers were said to have bundled the victim to an abandoned warehouse, where they tied him with cables, and assaulted him in a bid to steal about ¬£100,000 in digital assets. According to the police report, the crypto robbers took the victim into a flat in Irlam, Greater Manchester where they carried out their illegal deeds. However, their luck ran out after an anonymous report of welfare concerns was made by neighbors. The police arrived at the location, where they met a member of the gang, Karl Johnson, fleeing the crime scene. Upon entering the flat, the police said they met the victim, who had been violently assaulted, begging the officers to take him with them. The bruised victim had been tied to a bed by the criminals, and tortured with several objects while the criminals demanded that he transfer all his digital assets to them. Crypto robbers face seven decades in prison According to a statement made by the victim to the Greater Manchester Police, the crypto robbers kidnapped him and put a bag over his head. He mentioned that they then moved him into the flat before attacking him violently to transfer the digital assets in his possessions to them. During the investigation carried out by the Criminal Investigation Department, several weapons including firearms, metal baseball, and knives were found at the scene. The victim also mentioned that he had been threatened by the crypto robbers on several occasions to hand over his digital assets to the crypto robbers numerous times before they carried out this assault. He mentioned that the first incident occurred in January 2023, noting that a man threatened to assault him if he did not hand over his cryptocurrency stash to a member of the gang Scott Armstrong. He noted that he made the transfer and after the man confirmed, he left him alone. Later that month, another member of the gang, David Povey returned with another armed individual, demanding that the victim give up more assets. However, things started to escalate as the group attacks began, with the gang dragging the victim into a flat at Cadishead and another member Gary Edwards demanding more money. When he could not match up to their demands, he was attacked violently, and locked in a cupboard overnight. According to the report, another member Kane Goddiff had threatened the victim with death, asking him to hand over the money. Once he complied, they allowed him to leave. Days later, they returned to his house, kidnapped him, and took him to Eget Drive, where he was threatened again. The police mentioned that members of the gang ‚Äì David Povey, Scott Armstrong, Jonathan Newns, Luke Johnson, Karl Johnson, Gary Edwards, and Kane Goddiff have since been arrested and jailed for their crimes against the victim. Police investigation uncovers the groups‚Äô illicit activities The police mentioned that the last assault happened on November 30, with Gary Edwards approaching him after visiting a friend. Edwards covered his head and put him in a van. The authorities mentioned that they found DNA evidence that put Karl and Luke Johnson at the Irlam flat, while a document belonging to Johnson was also found at the location. Phone analysis showed that the crypto robbers contacted the victim the night before the first kidnap. Police also discovered that the victim and three other members of the gang were in constant communication. The men were arraigned at the Manchester Crown Court for their role in the crime. Jonathan Newns was jailed for 20 years on counts of false imprisonment, kidnap, and robbery. David Povey was also jailed for 20 years on the same counts. Luke Johnson was jailed for 13 years and six months on counts of kidnap and false imprisonment, while Gary Edwards was jailed for 10 years for attempted robbery. Kane Godiff was also handed a term of seven years and five months for armed robbery. Karl Johnson was handed a three-year jail term for assisting an armed robbery, while Scott Armstrong was sentenced to two years and four months in jail for transferring criminal property. The investigating officer Detective Stephanie Bowling mentioned how challenging the investigation was, but was glad that it resulted in the crypto robbers being arrested. ‚ÄúWhile I know that this sentence won‚Äôt change or take away from the trauma that our victim was subjected to, I sincerely hope that it helps him move forward with his life, safe in the knowledge that these men are now behind bars,‚Äù she added. title: In this Altcoin, Developers Say ‚ÄúThere is Manipulation Because We Allocate Too Few Tokens to Ourselves‚Äù, Demand More Tokens from the Community
body: Decentralized artificial intelligence project Swarms (SWARMS) has announced that its team plans to increase its token allocation from 2% to 10%, citing concerns over market manipulation and token instability. Swarms developers have admitted in a statement that the initial token distribution (keeping only 2% of the supply for the team) was a mistake. While the goal was to maximize decentralization, the decision left the project open to manipulation by large token holders and exchanges uncommitted to its long-term mission. ‚ÄúThis has caused instability, distraction, and threats to everything we are trying to build,‚Äù the Swarms team explained. Related News: Bitcoin Price Drops Below $100,000 - What Caused the Sudden Decline? To overcome these challenges, the team proposes a tokenomics adjustment that will allocate 10% of the total supply to the Swarms team. According to the developers, this change aims to: Accelerating AI research and development Providing staking rewards for long-term token holders Expanding community grants to attract top talent Strengthening the network against market manipulation Growing the ecosystem of AI pioneers supporting the project The proposal will be voted on via the Swarms DAO, allowing token holders to decide whether or not they approve the allocation change. *This is not investment advice. title: One More Big Leg up Coming for Crypto Markets, According to Widely-Followed Analyst
body: A widely followed crypto analyst says the odds are in favor of one more major move to the upside for digital assets before the market cycle concludes. The pseudonymous trader known as Pentoshi tells his 850,000 followers on the social media platform X that there‚Äôs a one in four chance that the crypto market cycle is over. The trader notes that he‚Äôs leaning towards the total market cap of all digital assets to reach the $4.2 trillion mark, about 26% higher than current levels. ‚ÄúI think maybe 25% odds the cycle is over and those calling it are correct. I think 75% odds we at least have one more macro leg up. In any case, the market has given us chances to buy the previous all-time high (high time frame supports for many altcoins) and many majors. There‚Äôs also a clear invalidation where if we traded below the previous all-time high, then yes, it‚Äôd likely be a time to reconsider. For now, it‚Äôs hard to look at this and think the market as a whole is in a bearish spot. What likely has happened is most people were in memes. With no exposure to BTC or even Solana. Lost a lot. And now believe the entire market is bearish. Where BTC + RWA (real-world assets) have been stronger We trend up. Consolidate/ chop. People trade it like a trend. And get chopped. Just how I view it currently.‚Äù Source: Pentoshi/X Looking at Ethereum ( ETH ) ‚Äì often viewed as a bellwether for incoming strength in the altcoin market ‚Äì Pentoshi says that a ‚Äúslow shift‚Äù is unfolding that will lead to ETH going back to its recent highs at around $4,000. ‚ÄúWhat seems impossible now, will be considered a guarantee later in my opinion. I don‚Äôt think ETH looks as bad as people claim currently. There‚Äôs a slow shift taking place, but I do think it‚Äôs happening. Weeks of downtrend can be erased in days. Back to the highs.‚Äù Source: Pentoshi/X At time of writing, ETH is worth $3,099. Considering the current bullish trend and XRP‚Äôs price action, a surge to $5 by the end of this year is not entirely out of the question, particularly if demand for XRP tokens continues to rise and its growth trajectory remains consistent.
